thread.title: Pakistani Pilgrims Benefiting from Makkah Route Initiative Commend High Level of Services, Facilities
thread.title_full: Pakistani Pilgrims Benefiting from Makkah Route Initiative Commend High Level of Services, Facilities

author: KARACHI, Pakistan - SPA
title: Pakistani Pilgrims Benefiting from Makkah Route Initiative Commend High Level of Services, Facilities
text:
Pakistani Pilgrims Benefiting from Makkah Route Initiative Commend High Level of Services, Facilities
Pilgrims from the Islamic Republic of Pakistan benefiting from the Makkah Route initiative, which operates at the Jinnah International Airport in Karachi, have commended the services and the facilities related to their travel to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia as part of its wider efforts to improve the services provided to pilgrims.
Having had their travel procedures finalized at the Makkah Route initiative’s lounge at the Jinnah Airport, Pakistani pilgrims expressed their gratitude and appreciation for the Kingdom’s immense contributions to facilitating travel procedures for pilgrims.
The Makkah Route is one of the initiatives that the Ministry of Interior continues as part of the Pilgrim Experience Program, one of the Saudi Vision 2030 programs. For the sixth year, the Interior Ministry is implementing the initiative in cooperation with several other ministries and authorities, including Foreign Affairs, Health, Hajj, Umrah, Media, the General Authority of Civil Aviation, the Saudi Data and Artificial Intelligence Authority (SDAIA), the Pilgrim Experience Program, the General Directorate of Passports, and Zakat, Tax, and Customs Authorities.

organizations.name: makkah route initiative commend high level of services
